title: The Boeing 747: The Queen of the Skies
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on The Boeing 747: The Queen of the Skies.

hook.text: The Boeing 747's iconic hump exists because engineers expected cargo planes to replace it. They were wrong.

discovery.text: The wide-body cabin with twin aisles transformed flying from elite privilege to mass transportation.

twist.text: The upper deck was designed for easy cockpit access in cargo mode. Instead, airlines turned it into a lounge.

climax.text: The 747 didn't just change aviation design â€” it democratized international travel for billions.

punchline.text: A plane designed for cargo changed how humans see the world.

quiz.question: Why does the Boeing 747 have its distinctive hump?
